committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to reduce the salaries of Senators, Members of the House of Representatives, and other Federal officers and employees.

summary.text: Reduces by 10 percent the salaries of Senators, Members of the House of Representatives, and other Federal officers and employees whose annual basic pay is $40,000 or more. Expresses the sense of Congress that the President should voluntarily return 10 percent of his annual salary to the U.S. Treasury.

titles.title: A bill to reduce the salaries of Senators, Members of the House of Representatives, and other Federal officers and employees.
